email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Santos, 10,000MT of Fertilizer - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

I hope this message finds you well. We are exploring options for shipping 10,000MT of fertilizer from Rotterdam to Santos under FOB terms. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for this route. Could you confirm your interest and provide a lumpsum freight quote?

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Santos, 10,000MT of Fertilizer - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for your inquiry. We are interested in the shipment. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best regards,
Thomas Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Santos, 10,000MT of Fertilizer - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

The MV OCEAN STAR has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 200m. The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-10-01. The initial lumpsum freight quote is USD 450,000.

Please let me know if you need further details.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Santos, 10,000MT of Fertilizer - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the details. The lumpsum rate of USD 450,000 seems a bit high considering current market conditions. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates applicable and the expected loading window in Rotterdam?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best, Thomas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Santos, 10,000MT of Fertilizer - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised lumpsum freight quote of USD 430,000. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, and the expected loading window in Rotterdam is from 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-05.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Santos, 10,000MT of Fertilizer - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

The revised rate and terms are acceptable. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
Thomas Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Rotterdam to Santos, 10,000MT of Fertilizer - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-05. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez
